description: This is Behind the Blog, where we share our behind-the-scenes thoughts about how a few of our top stories of the week came together. This week, we discuss FOIAing after those racist pet-eating claims, the art and science of paywalling, and gambling with journalism.
title: Behind the Blog: Newsworthy FOIA Files and the Art and Science of Paywalling

description: In this special podcast episode, we talk subscriber numbers, what people value, how to get our articles in front of people, and what we're looking to do next year.
title: Podcast: One Year Anniversary Subscriber Bonanza
